Death And God

March 2010

If we will act like God we will desire Death too.

These two last standing memes will challenge us beyond imagination.

Remember when you were kid and musing about your own funeral? That will happen to be true very often in digital.

This essay is about the world. With focus on values, death, god, memes, the web.
There Is No Privacy In Augmented Reality
Hollywood And Internet
